Writing this review after one month of usage of this chair. I will try to divide the review in pros and cons so you can understand it better.
 
 Pros -
 1 - cushioning is fine.
 2- price is decent
 3- wheels are moving good and does not get stuck.
 4 - recline for back support and hand support is good.
 5 - initial customer support was excellent and proper follow-up was done on emails and through phone calls when I faced some issue with the product.
 
 Cons -
 1 - material used to build the chair is not best of class.
 2 - back spine support is very loose and does not stay at the same position so you have to adjust it many times.
 3 - Thigh support is not that great as the sitting area doesn‚Äôt slide forward, which sometimes becomes little annoying.
 4 - you cannot lock multiple recline positions as there is just one option to lock or you completely unlock the recline.

This chair is very poor in terms of lumbar support, If you are someone who works remote or sits for a long time this chair is not suitable and would result in back pain
 Built quality is also poor, the chair I have bought is slanted towards right and I am keeping a pillow on the back for additional support.

I recently purchased an ottoman with a 3 seater sofa, but I have been extremely disappointed with the quality and customer support. The top of the ottoman is uneven and one corner is pressed down, which is not up to par with the Wakefit Napper sofa I bought alongside it.
 
 The customer support has been unprofessional and impractical. After I reported that the ottoman came with two loose legs, I was told a carpenter would visit within 48-72 hours to fix it. However, I never heard from them until I received a call after a couple of weeks later asking if the carpenter had visited. This pattern continued for the next three months, with weekly calls promising a visit within 48-72 hours that never materialized. It wasn't until I reached out to them on Twitter that a carpenter finally visited, but the repairs were inadequate and resulted in a cracked leg. Despite multiple attempts to resolve the issue, I am still waiting for a replacement. The latest update from customer support was that they will send all four legs with a carpenter and add a ply board at the bottom to fix the legs in place, which will unfortunately increase the height of the ottoman and make it incompatible with the sofa.
 
 Overall, I would not recommend this product due to the poor quality and frustrating customer support experience. Save yourself the time and frustration and look for a different ottoman.

Probably one of the worst pillows you can ever buy.
 
 In the beginning they appear pretty good especially as you open them out of the packaging and watch them grow big. They are quite comfortable in the beginning but as time passes by, they start losing the fluffiness and start getting flatter. After a few weeks, they just don't provide any support to the neck whatsoever.
 I recommended this pillow to my other family members also based upon my experience of first few days, but that was a bad advice. All the pillows lost all support after a few weeks.
 This is the reason they also provide you extra synthetic fibre that you can add to the pillows if they loose the fluffiness but that also won't last long.
 
 Don't go by the all 5 star reviews. Without a doubt, majority of them are fake. The rest are based only on using the pillows for a few days. As many other reviewers have ALSO mentioned, plenty of my older pillows still provide better cushioning and support than these. Wakefit is one of the worst companies and after using many wakefit products I can easily suggest anyone to stay away from them. Their quality has gone down for the worst. As far as these pillows are concerned, absolutely NOT RECOMMENDED.

1. Product delivered ahead of promised time
 
 2. Defective piece delivered - crack in a corner of one of the ply pieces affixed on back - shown in the attached pic
 
 3. Back side of the wardrobe is not how it is shown in the 360 degree view video on the product description page - please refer to the video attached by me
 
 4. Returning the product is a nightmare - even if they agree to the same - They told me that they will get my wardrobe picked up in a week's time but they cannot guarantee when their partners will come for pick up - so either someone stays at home all the time or leave the wardrobe with a neighbor or a security guard if they ever have to move out
 
 5. Despite assurances, they won't pick up the product nor update you on status of the same - I waited patiently for a week for the pickup that never happened.
 
 6. Upon follow up, I was told that the pick up was delayed due to unavoidable circumstances and that the same can be scheduled again as per my convenience. However, I do not want to be grounded for any more period of time, so I gave up.
 
 7. Amazon guarantee program does not seem to be of much help since they are dependent on the seller picking up the product for return which, unfortunately, in this case, never seems to happen.
 
 I have finally decided to retain the defective product and see how long it lasts. Hope it will last me at least for a year, the warranty period of the product.
 
 Really expected better of you, Wakefit! Totally disappointed :(

I had bought this mattress thinking that an Orthopaedic mattress will give better support and comfort to the back and will a better support at night. However, this mattress has not been very comfortable for me. I more often than not end up waking with some back pain and uneasiness in the morning. But the 2 star rating is not because of this issue as I understand each person has a different body type and thus could just be an issue for me. The lower rating has been given because of Wakefit's inconsistent return policy across different platforms. I had bought the product assuming the 100 day no question asked return policy but turns out that the policy is only applicable when you buy the product via Wakefit website and not Flipkart. On Flipkart you only get 30 days warranty and 10 days return time period which is quite less for testing the mattress. Different return policies on different platforms just makes the buying process confusing for customers. Hence I would recommend that if you are really looking to buy this product , buy from Wakefit website so that you can appropriately test the product and get enough time to return the product if you want to.

I recently purchased a SnoozePro 5 seater sofa from Wakefit, but unfortunately, the product arrived in an extremely unsatisfactory state. The sofa was wet and covered in dirt and grime, with its outer covering torn in several places. Upon inquiry, the delivery boys informed me that the product got wet in the rain during shipment.
 I was extremely disappointed to see the condition of the sofa upon delivery. I had high hopes for the product, but the state in which it arrived was unacceptable. I understand that accidents can happen during transportation, but as a customer, I expect the product to arrive in a new and undamaged state.
 As a result of the poor condition of the sofa, I am requesting either a replacement or a refund from Wakefit. I believe that the company should take responsibility for the condition in which the product arrived and provide a satisfactory resolution to the issue.
 I was excited to receive the SnoozePro 5 seater sofa and had high expectations for its quality and comfort. However, the product that I received was far from satisfactory, and I believe that I am entitled to a resolution that meets my expectations as a customer.
 I hope that Wakefit will take the necessary steps to address the issue and provide a satisfactory resolution soon.

Well it‚Äôs just a engineered/ processed wood product so only time will tell wether it‚Äôs actually durable or not but the customer service girl keeps texting me on Watsapp to give 5 star reviews and it‚Äôs really annoying.
 Pros: 1) Price.
 Cons:
 1) Storage. It‚Äôs not a box storage nor a hydraulic storage like you would expect. There are four compartments under the mattress and nothing on the underside apart from a thin paper like layer which is put right on the floor.
 2) If you have read and understood point no 1 then you would immediately question about cleaning under the bed. You can‚Äôt, there‚Äôs no gap between the bed and the floor. Since the bed is literally on the floor and using the floor as the storage.
 3) The height of the bed is low so it‚Äôs not comfortable to sit on as there is no underthigh support specifically if you‚Äôre on the taller side.
 
 The only reason to get this bed would be budget constraints as it offers tremendous value and you are willing to live with the above compromises.

Order Number: 407-7426176-XXXXXXX
 Order Date: 14.12.2022
 Package received on: 23.12.2022
 Day using: 113 day
 Price: 6901/-
 *** Pieces of form don't go on the specification **
 ****Please don't buy this mattress it's useless totally. ***
 
 ***If you still want it, then buy from the official site they give 100 days trial **
 
 **look at the packing photo attached ** @ Amazon team for you also
 ***Here is my experience *
 The product was received in a potli-type bag, the bag was damaged from the outside but the package was safe. After someday, of receipt mattress, I received a call from the Wakefit team regarding a review of the mattress I said facing back pain and neck pain from the day of starting he said to wait for 30 days as it takes time to adjust you will be fine after 30 days of use he also advises using both sides as per my choice. But even after 40 days problem was the same heavy back pain and neck pain in the morning as I complain about on Amazon. Amazon executive registered a complaint against the seller he said the seller will solve your problem. After 2 days I received a call from Wakefit I explained my problem and he said sorry sir we can't do anything please contact the seller (Amazon ) as the discomfort issue can't be covered By warranty than again I contact Amazon and explain what Wakefit said and they said sorry sir we can't do anything as your return period already over you, please contact wakefit.
 Now I am helpless from both sides.
 
 Not just me my wife also faced back pain in the morning she isn't ready to sleep on it so now the mattress is useless.
 
 Please read review before buying don't go for 4.5 stars rating.
 
 Instead of this try a cotton mattress half price of this wakefit piece of foam.

Style Name: 72x36x6 inchPattern Name: Original MattressSize: Single
 I have purchased ‚ÄúWakefit Orthopedic Memory Foam 6-Inch Single Size Mattress (72x36x6 Inches, Medium Firm, White)‚Äù. I am very disappointed with the product as well as customer service. My review is below.
 
 1) NOT AT ALL ORTHOPEDIC!!
 It is a very poor quality mattress. Don‚Äôt know why the description says Orthopedic mattress as I feel back pain every morning. This mattress is too soft will completely sink may result in back pain and spinal problems in the long run. Also as it is too soft and cannot be used for sitting (only for sleeping). You will fall from the bed if you sit close to the edge.
 
 2) FALSE REVIEWS
 If you go through the negative reviews you will understand their support ensures that only 5 star reviews remain and the rest get removed. Instead they should accept genuine rating and work on improving their product.
 
 3) FALSE PROMISE FROM WAKEFIT CUSTOMER SUPPORT
 If you raise the back pain issue to the customer support, their standard reply to your issue will be that
 a) It take 15-20 days for your body to adjust to new mattress OR
 b) Kindly invert the mattress and use it for 15-20 days
 My question to them is, if they know that 15-20 is required by the body to adjust to new mattress they why only provide ‚Äò10 days Replacement only‚Äô. Instead they should provide 30 days refund/replacement.
 I had requested for refund from but the status is ‚ÄòReturn pending seller approval‚Äô. I received call from wakefit support and they provided me with the above solutions and if these don‚Äôt work then they told that they will assist with the return. I asked them how I will request refund if the period is open, to which their executive assured that this case shall remain open till then. To my surprise, in the evening I received the following e-mail ‚ÄúWakefit has closed the return request listed below. Reason for the closure of your request: Solved a technical issue‚Äù.
 After discussion with the support executive I was about to give it another try form 2-3 days, but this type of false promise ensured that I should not trust the Wakefit Brand.
 
 4) MY RECOMMENDATION
 As they only have online store and not physical store you cannot experience the mattress before buying, I would recommend you to buy a mattress in-store after experiencing it.

Ordered it on wakefit website. Got delivered quickly and the installation was also done at the time of delivery. After a few hours when I tried using it, felt that the height of the chair seat is not enough - was not able to work properly on my desk. Checked the product page to see the expected height - it was mentioned as 45cm - 55cm. On measuring it for my chair, found it to be ~47cm at max height. Reported this to wakefit and that's the start of the horrible experience.
 
 I took a photo with a measuring tape and provided that as part of initial support request itself. They called by after a few days and asked me to provide a video of the measurement. I did that as well and the same is attached here. After a few days again, they called back and told me some story about the production team needing another video which has to be taken based on a demo video that they would share!
 
 Take a look at the video and decide for yourself if the issue is clear to you or not! If you deciding to buy a wakefit product and you run into a support issue, be ready to take video taking courses and certifications to be able to share data with them, they will take their sweet time and do all R&D.
 
 It's been 10 days and still waiting for a confirmation from them of the acceptance that this is a manufacturing issue and they will replace the chair or refund my money, etc.

Finally I had to tell her that I will talk to you through Amazon people only.

 That's not OK. Because of juggling between Amazon and Wakefit, my return window will be closed. How can a company cover 3 years warranty when they are not even able to resolve the complaint of a new product.

I ordered this product and tried it for 10 days thinking I'll get used to it. Here are the problems -
 
 - Too soft, so it will take the shape as per your body position but won't support it.
 - It's memory foam, so it's fine for winters but it becomes hot in summers. Not good for most places in India.
 - Somehow I managed to return it but don't order without verifying this product physically.
 
 Don't post reviews about them until you are fully satisfied. They'll keep calling you for good reviews but take your time to share your experience.

This one is a cheap bed and the quality is also the same. You can say what you want at this price, but I can pay a few more to get a little better product.
 
 Pros - Price
 Cons -
 - MDF board is too fragile.
 - After installation is done don't drag or move. Otherwise, it'll break and there is no way to fix it.
 - Wipe out the water immediately, and ask your maid not to do wet cleaning near the bed or it will get spoil.
 - It's cheap engineering wood so there will be sounds.
 - If wood is chipped near the screw then the bed is waste.
 
 Beware before ordering, read the return policy carefully. Write down concerns on the invoice which you are signing while receiving the product, it'll help you later. You'll thank me later for this information :)

The wakefit products though seems cheap is not of good quality. They do not have common sense and good knowledge about the product. TL;DR If you love your sleep and peace of mind, avoid this product.
 
 Sequence of events:
 
 1. It took Wakefit 4 delivery attempts and 3 replacements across 16 days to finally deliver a defect free unit.
 2. Each time (i.e. 4 times), I stayed back at home all day to receive delivery as they won't tell us what time they will be reaching. But the customer is expected to be at home when it comes - it could be 10 in the morning or 8 in the evening. Our time isn't as important as theirs.
 3. Their staff drags the product all the way from the truck until your door -- through the corridor, lift etc. Including the MDF boards which are brittle and easily damaged if handled rough. It is too much effort for them to lift it to avoid damage to your product bought with hard earned money.
 4. The staff did not have any tool to fix the nails, so what did they do? They used the wooden legs of the bed to hit on the nails and bolts to push them in.
 5. The product delivered to me the first time had manufacturing defect and couldn't be assembled -- their staff tried doing some 'jugaad' to somehow force assemble -- so they don't have to take it back. It appears these guys have targets and are almost always in super hurry to leave.
 6. The second time the product delivered had multiple defects -- 1) wood chipped off at many places 2) Foam tape for support missing 3) big gaps b/w the MDF boards that be breeding ground for insects etc
 7. The staff tried justifying most defects so they don't have to take the defective product back. For eg. I was told the gaps b/w the MDF boards are by design so our fingers can get in to life them when needed.
 8. Extremely poor workmanship overall in general and these guys are always in hurry
 9. The third time I was made to wait at home all day but it never arrived
 10. The fourth time after escalation to their entire leadership, I was finally offered a defect-free product and a good competent carpenter
 11. It took at least 75+ calls and emails and multiple whatsapp exchanges across the Wakefit management and hierarchy to resolve this. Most of them including their top leadership don't care to respond or even acknowledge. You are left to suffer their incompetence.
 12. The most painful customer service organisation one can come across, broken at many levels, each team/individual operating in their own silos -- you wouldn't wish such an experience for your worst enemies.

I purchased an office chair from Wakefit about 12 months back, hoping for a reliable and durable seating solution. However, my experience with the chair has been quite disappointing. Despite my limited use, with sparing reclining only once or twice a day, the chair's back snapped unexpectedly, causing me to fall.
 
 As someone weighing around 75 kgs, well within the chair's weight capacity, I expected sturdiness and flexibility in the chair's construction. Unfortunately, the quality and resilience of the plastic used in the chair are questionable. It is disheartening to encounter such a major issue with the chair's back, especially considering how lightly I have used it.
 
 Now, I find myself faced with a dilemma. I am unsure if Wakefit offers replacement parts for their chairs, specifically the back in this case. Alternatively, I may have to spend more money to purchase an entirely new chair. It is frustrating to realize that the price I paid for this chair did not guarantee the longevity and reliability I expected.
 
 In conclusion, I am deeply disappointed with the durability of the Wakefit office chair. The unexpected snapping of the back has left me with concerns about the overall quality of the product. I hope Wakefit takes these issues seriously and works towards improving the durability and construction of their chairs in the future.

E-commerce works on trust. So whenever a customer wants to buy something from any website, apart from their own research they mostly rely on the reviews and the customer experience of the item. However, it is almost sad to see that some sellers such as Wakefit are taking advantage of this process and generating a fake buzz around their products. Here's what happened.
 
 After I got my order delivered, I quite liked it from the get-go and I never had a complaint about it ever since. However, maybe after a day or two of receiving the item I was contacted by a Wakefit associate on the phone. Primarily I was surprised to receive this call since I believed Amazon always had a tight policy around sharing customer personal information. Post the discussion around the product and my personal experience of the delivery process I was pressurized by the Wakefit associate to rate their product positively and share a screenshot with them over WhatsApp.
 
 Now, as I mentioned I already liked the product and I was going to provide a positive review anyway but because of this pressure created by the Wakefit associate, I was forced to do something where I felt I had no choice. While ordering this item I never thought why all the products from the aforementioned brand mostly have positive ratings and now I know.
 
 With this kind of practice, this seller is generating an illusion of popularity and is able to get their products to rank much higher than they should be on a fair and open market that Amazon claims to host.

Now wakefit is not ready to replace or do partial refund for the product. Now I have paid more and stuck with lower version of the product. totally not satisfied with the product.

I am utterly disappointed with the poor quality and durability of this product. Within just one month of purchase, the bean bag tore apart, leaving me with nothing but frustration and regret.
 
 First of all, let me begin by saying that the initial impression of the bean bag was quite positive. It appeared to be comfortable and well-designed, and I was excited to have a cozy addition to my living room. However, my enthusiasm quickly turned into disappointment when the seams started to unravel.
 
 The tearing of the bean bag is simply unacceptable. I expected it to withstand regular usage, but it couldn't even last a few weeks. The fabric used is clearly of subpar quality, unable to handle the slightest strain or pressure. It's as if the manufacturer used the flimsiest materials possible, sacrificing durability for cost-cutting measures.
 
 What's even more frustrating is that I didn't subject the bean bag to any excessive use or abuse. I used it mainly for casual seating, and I expected it to hold up under such normal conditions. However, the seams simply couldn't handle the regular weight and movement, resulting in an embarrassing tear.

My recent purchase of a Wakefit Bed and Wakefit Mattress in queen size has turned into a complete disaster. The blatant incompatibility between these supposedly matching products is beyond frustrating.
 
 I expected a seamless fit and a comfortable sleeping experience, considering that both the bed and mattress are from the same brand and in the same size. However, the mattress refuses to snugly fit into the bed frame, creating a constant slide that makes sleep impossible and discomfort inevitable. Despite my efforts to secure the mattress, it remains an uncooperative nuisance.
 
 The lack of attention to detail and quality control by Wakefit is truly appalling. How can a brand sell products that are incompatible with each other? This negligence shows a complete disregard for customer satisfaction and reflects poorly on the company as a whole.
 
 To make matters worse, when I sought assistance from Wakefit's customer service, their response was utterly unsatisfactory. The lack of empathy and unwillingness to address the issue demonstrated their indifference toward resolving customer concerns. It appears that their only interest lies in making the sale, with no regard for providing post-purchase support.
 
 I strongly caution potential buyers against considering Wakefit products, particularly if you are planning to purchase both the bed and mattress. The severe incompatibility issue I experienced is not something to be taken lightly. Don't subject yourself to the frustration and inconvenience that I went through.
 
 In summary, the Wakefit Bed and Mattress have proven to be an abysmal failure. The complete lack of fit between the two products, combined with the abysmal customer service, has left me deeply dissatisfied and regretful of my purchase. I vehemently discourage anyone from wasting their hard-earned money on these unreliable and uncomfortable sleep solutions.

What a colossal letdown!
 
 I purchased a Wakefit Bed and Wakefit Mattress, both queen size, expecting a perfect match. Instead, I was met with an infuriating incompatibility.
 
 The mattress simply refuses to fit properly into the bed, despite being from the same brand and size.
 
 It slides around incessantly, making sleep impossible and comfort nonexistent. Wakefit's negligence in ensuring basic compatibility between their own products is unforgivable.
 
 Save yourself the frustration and avoid this brand's unreliable sleep solutions at all costs.

I recently purchased the Wakefit Double Bed, and I must say it has been a complete disaster from start to finish. The poor installation of this bed has left me utterly dissatisfied and regretting my decision.
 
 To begin with, the fitting of the bed is absolutely atrocious. There are wide and unsightly gaps between the bed's structure and the floor sheets, making it a breeding ground for dust and debris. It's as if the bed was hastily put together without any attention to detail or quality control. As a result, any belongings I try to store under the bed will inevitably become a dusty mess in no time.
 
 I cannot stress enough how important it is not to be swayed by the positive reviews on Amazon. I fell into that trap, believing that this product would live up to the hype, but it has proven to be nothing more than a disappointment. The glowing reviews must be fabricated or written by people who received a different product altogether.
 
 I had high hopes for this bed, but it is clear that the product is far from being up to the mark. The lack of proper fitting and finishing makes it an eyesore in my bedroom, and it fails to serve its basic function as a reliable box bed.
 
 Moreover, the customer service I received when attempting to address the issue was equally lackluster. They showed little concern for my grievances and were unhelpful in resolving the matter. It's apparent that the company's focus is on selling a subpar product rather than ensuring customer satisfaction.
 
 If you're considering purchasing a Wakefit Double Bed, I strongly advise against it. Don't be fooled by any positive feedback you come across, as it's most likely a far cry from reality. The poor installation and lack of attention to detail make this bed a terrible investment. Save yourself the trouble and avoid this product at all costs.

When I first saw the advertisements for this mattress, it seemed like the answer to all my sleeping problems. They boasted about its superior comfort, back support, and luxurious feel. Eager to improve my sleep quality, I decided to give it a try. Little did I know that it would become a nightmare that would haunt my nights.
 
 The first issue arose with the so-called "superior comfort." Instead of sinking into a cloud of coziness, I felt like I was lying on a lumpy boulder. The supposed "memory foam" felt more like a distant memory, as it provided zero contouring or support to my body. My spine suffered the most, as I woke up with aching back muscles every morning.
 
 And speaking of support, the Wakefit Spring Mattress was an utter failure. They promised optimal alignment for a restful sleep, but all I got was a misaligned mess. It seemed like the springs were placed haphazardly, creating uncomfortable pressure points that made me toss and turn all night, seeking a position that would bring some relief.
 
 As if that wasn't enough, the mattress's durability left much to be desired. It was supposed to be built to last, but it started sagging within a few Days of use. It felt like I was sinking into a black hole every time I lay down, and no amount of flipping or rotating seemed to make a difference.
 
 The worst part was dealing with their customer service. When I reached out to them with my concerns and dissatisfaction, they showed no empathy or willingness to help. It felt like they had no interest in standing behind their product or ensuring customer satisfaction.
 
 In the end, I had to cut my losses and replace the Wakefit Spring Mattress with a more reliable one from a different brand. It was a hard lesson learned ‚Äì don't fall for the fancy marketing and promising claims without researching thoroughly.
 
 If you value your sleep and your sanity, stay far away from the Wakefit Spring Mattress. It's a gamble you don't want to take, as you'll likely end up regretting it, just like I did. Save yourself the pain and invest in a mattress that truly lives up to its promises. This one is nothing but a spring-loaded disappointment.

Customer Name: DARSHAN P V Certified Buyer, Bangalore
review_body:
Good Wardrobe, but Missing Locking Slot
 
 
 
 I recently purchased a 4-door wardrobe, and overall, I am satisfied with the quality and design. The wardrobe itself looks elegant and provides ample storage space for my belongings. The carpentry work seems well-done, and the finishing is good.
 
 However, there is an issue that needs attention. Unfortunately, the carpenter forgot to include the locking slot on the doors as promised. While I was provided with a key, it's disappointing that I am unable to use it due to the missing locking mechanism. Security and privacy are important factors for me, and this oversight is quite inconvenient.
 
 I appreciate the timely delivery and the carpenter's professionalism during the installation process. I hope the issue with the missing locking slot can be resolved promptly. If this matter is addressed, I would be more than willing to give a higher rating for an otherwise well-crafted wardrobe.
 
 In conclusion, the wardrobe's quality and design are commendable, but the absence of the locking slot is a significant drawback. I hope for a resolution to this issue soon.
 
 Please note that this review is based on my personal experience and observations.
